title: Cloud Security Posture Scan
description: An analyst must run a Cloud Security Posture Management (CSPM) scan to find misconfigurations in the company's AWS environment.

tasks.description: Configure the CSPM tool with read-only credentials to the AWS environment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst securely configures the tool's access.

tasks.description: Launch the scan against the AWS environment.
Analyze the results and identify a critical misconfiguration: an S3 bucket containing sensitive data that is open to the public internet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies and prioritizes a critical cloud misconfiguration.
